title: Otomege no Mob desura Nai n da ga
original_name: 乙女ゲーのモブですらないんだが
sinopse:
Taichi reincarnated in the world of otome games as a gardener apprentice. However, there is no such character in the original game... A story of interaction and growth woven by the daughter of the Duke, Lydia, and a boy who is not even a mob character.

(Source: Square Enix, translated)
